channel.title: Hello help me plz
channel.description: i downloaded a server fr33sc4p3 i get it online everything ok but the npcs say thug life is offline and the chearleaders say whe love fr33sc4pe and above there is owner=fr33sc4pe how i get rid of this ?

item.title: Hello help me plz
item.dc:creator: @m_jon_h m jon h
item.description:
@m_jon_h wrote:

[quote=“pr1v4te, post:4, topic:74793”][quote author=m jon h link=topic=109837.msg1096008#msg1096008 date=1175802478]
go to npc handler in your source and you should find the npcs that are saying it and underneath that it should say the text change that to what you want save,compile,run
[/quote] i did that and they keep saying thug life is offline ![/quote]
did you save and compile :P?

Read full topic

item.title: Hello help me plz
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Just go into NPCHandler.java and either change what they say, or totally delete those NPC’s. I can tell you to search for 636 because that is the NPC ID for Cheerleaders. That will take you to the part of NPCHandler.java that has all the NPC’s that say things.

Read full topic
